name: CubeTwist (GuiDev Games)
description:
Version InDev 2

At the moment the game is still in development...

Create your own Level!

Play to the beat of the music!

Share your Gameplay!

Video (Spanish Language)

coming soon: 
  • You can share your level on the server
  • You will be able to play levels made by the developer.
  • You can customize your "Character" or Cube
  • You can see your statistics and much more! 
Support the project and spread it... soon more updates

if you donate 5 usd or more, you get a free copy when the game is released
